description.zh-cn: 中华民国国民革命军将领，后担任中华人民共和国国防委员会副主席等职务。他因在辽沈战役期间的决策而被国民党政府视为东北失陷的责任人。
description.en: A general of the National Revolutionary Army of the Republic of China, who later served as Vice Chairman of the National Defense Commission of the People's Republic of China. He was held responsible by the Nationalist government for the loss of Northeast China during the Liaoshen Campaign.

description.zh-cn: 卫立煌的第二任妻子，毕业于皮尔德音乐学院，曾任中华人民共和国国务院参事室参事及第四届全国人大代表。
description.en: Wei Lihuang's second wife, a graduate of the Peabody Institute, who served as a counselor in the Counselors' Office of the State Council of the PRC and a deputy to the 4th National People's Congress.

description.zh-cn: 中华民国政治人物和军事领袖，曾任国民革命军总司令和中华民国总统。
description.en: A Chinese political and military leader who served as the leader of the Republic of China.

description.zh-cn: 中华人民共和国首任国务院总理，曾邀请卫立煌返回中国大陆。
description.en: The first Premier of the People's Republic of China, who invited Wei Lihuang to return to mainland China.

description.zh-cn: 中国共产党和中华人民共和国的主要缔造者和领导人。
description.en: A Chinese communist revolutionary who was the founding father of the People's Republic of China.

description.zh-cn: 中国共产党和中华人民共和国的军事领导人，中国人民解放军的创始人和总司令。
description.en: A Chinese Communist military leader, founder and commander-in-chief of the People's Liberation Army.

description.zh-cn: 中华民国国民革命军将领，在辽沈战役期间被蒋中正任命为东北剿总副总司令以制衡卫立煌。
description.en: A general of the National Revolutionary Army of the Republic of China, appointed by Chiang Kai-shek as Deputy Commander-in-Chief of the Northeast Bandit Suppression Headquarters during the Liaoshen Campaign to counterbalance Wei Lihuang.

description.zh-cn: 物理学家，韩权华的外甥女婿，曾帮助卫立煌与中国共产党建立联系，并担任其少将副秘书长。
description.en: A physicist, nephew-in-law of Han Quanhua, who helped Wei Lihuang establish contact with the Chinese Communist Party and served as his Major General Deputy Secretary-General.

description.zh-cn: 中国共产党地下党员，曾在卫立煌的第二战区担任秘书，并受命组建“战地工作团”。
description.en: An underground member of the Chinese Communist Party who served as a secretary in Wei Lihuang's Second War Area and was tasked with forming a 'Field Work Group'.

description.zh-cn: 中华民国的创建政党，卫立煌曾是其中央执行委员。
description.en: The founding political party of the Republic of China, of which Wei Lihuang was a Central Executive Committee member.

nodes.id: 中国国民党革命委员会

zh-cn: 中国国民党革命委员会
en: Revolutionary Committee of the Chinese Kuomintang

description.zh-cn: 中华人民共和国的民主党派之一，由中国国民党的左派和反蒋成员组成。卫立煌回归大陆后担任其中央常委。
description.en: One of the democratic parties in the People's Republic of China, formed by left-wing and anti-Chiang members of the Kuomintang. Wei Lihuang became a member of its Central Standing Committee after returning to the mainland.

description.zh-cn: 中华民国时期培养高级军事人才的最高学府。
description.en: The highest military academy for training senior military personnel during the Republic of China era.

description.zh-cn: 中国抗日战争期间，由中国共产党领导的、编入国民革命军序列的正规军事力量。
description.en: The main military force of the Chinese Communist Party under the command of the National Revolutionary Army during the Second Sino-Japanese War.

description.zh-cn: 国共内战期间，中华民国国民政府在东北地区设立的最高军事指挥机构。
description.en: The highest military command institution established by the Nationalist Government of the Republic of China in Northeast China during the Chinese Civil War.

nodes.id: 中华人民共和国国防委员会

zh-cn: 中华人民共和国国防委员会
en: National Defense Commission of the People's Republic of China

description.zh-cn: 1954年至1975年间中华人民共和国的国家军事机构，负责领导全国武装力量。
description.en: The state military organ of the People's Republic of China from 1954 to 1975, responsible for leading the national armed forces.

description.zh-cn: 国共内战“三大战役”之一，中国人民解放军东北野战军在此战役中占领了东北全境，国民革命军东北剿总部队几乎全军覆没。
description.en: One of the 'Three Great Campaigns' of the Chinese Civil War, in which the Northeast Field Army of the People's Liberation Army captured the entire Northeast region, resulting in the near-total annihilation of the National Revolutionary Army's forces in the Northeast.

description.zh-cn: 一场由张学良和杨虎城发动的军事政变，他们扣押了蒋中正，迫使其停止内战、联共抗日。卫立煌在此事件中与蒋一同被囚。
description.en: A military coup launched by Zhang Xueliang and Yang Hucheng, who detained Chiang Kai-shek to force him to end the civil war and form a united front with the Communists against Japan. Wei Lihuang was imprisoned along with Chiang during this incident.

description.zh-cn: 中华人民共和国的执政党。
description.en: The ruling political party of the People's Republic of China.

description.zh-cn: 卫立煌的出生地，位于清代安徽省庐州府。
description.en: Wei Lihuang's birthplace, located in Luzhou Prefecture, Anhui Province, during the Qing Dynasty.

description.zh-cn: 中华人民共和国的首都，卫立煌在此逝世。
description.en: The capital of the People's Republic of China, where Wei Lihuang passed away.

description.zh-cn: 韩权华是卫立煌的第二任妻子，两人于1945年6月15日在昆明结婚。
description.en: Han Quanhua was Wei Lihuang's second wife; they married in Kunming on June 15, 1945.

degree.en: Special Class for Generals, First Term

description.zh-cn: 1928年，卫立煌被保送至陆军大学将官特别班第一期深造。
description.en: In 1928, Wei Lihuang was admitted to the Special Class for Generals, First Term, at the Army University for advanced studies.

description.zh-cn: 1935年11月，卫立煌在中国国民党第五次全国代表大会上当选为中央执行委员。
description.en: In November 1935, Wei Lihuang was elected as a member of the Central Executive Committee at the 5th National Congress of the Kuomintang.

description.zh-cn: 1948年1月，卫立煌被任命为东北剿匪总司令部总司令，后因东北失陷被撤职查办。
description.en: In January 1948, Wei Lihuang was appointed Commander-in-Chief of the Northeast Bandit Suppression Headquarters and was later dismissed and investigated for the loss of the Northeast.

relationships.target: 中华人民共和国国防委员会

description.zh-cn: 1959年，卫立煌被任命为中华人民共和国国防委员会副主席，直至去世。
description.en: In 1959, Wei Lihuang was appointed Vice Chairman of the National Defense Commission of the People's Republic of China, a position he held until his death.

description.zh-cn: 抗日战争初期，卫立煌在主政华北期间与中共军队关系良好，曾私自向八路军提供大量弹药、物资和通讯设备。
description.en: In the early stages of the Second Sino-Japanese War, while in charge in North China, Wei Lihuang maintained good relations with CCP forces and privately supplied the Eighth Route Army with large quantities of ammunition, supplies, and communication equipment.

description.zh-cn: 在辽沈战役期间，卫立煌拒绝执行蒋中正要求其将主力撤出沈阳、打通锦州通道的命令，导致战局恶化。
description.en: During the Liaoshen Campaign, Wei Lihuang refused to carry out Chiang Kai-shek's order to withdraw his main forces from Shenyang and open a corridor to Jinzhou, which led to the deterioration of the military situation.

description.zh-cn: 因东北战事失利，蒋中正于1948年11月16日下令将卫立煌撤职查办，并将其软禁于南京。
description.en: Due to the military failure in the Northeast, Chiang Kai-shek ordered Wei Lihuang's dismissal and investigation on November 16, 1948, and placed him under house arrest in Nanjing.

description.zh-cn: 周恩来通过邓颖超秘书和卫立煌的亲属邀请当时旅居香港的卫立煌返回中国大陆，促成了其在1955年3月回归。
description.en: Through Deng Yingchao's secretary and Wei Lihuang's relatives, Zhou Enlai invited Wei, who was living in Hong Kong, to return to mainland China, facilitating his return in March 1955.

description.zh-cn: 辽沈战役的失败导致国民党军队在东北全军覆没，卫立煌因此被撤职查办，其军事生涯就此终结。
description.en: The failure of the Liaoshen Campaign resulted in the annihilation of the Nationalist forces in the Northeast, leading to Wei Lihuang's dismissal and investigation, which effectively ended his military career.

description.zh-cn: 在西安事变期间，卫立煌与蒋中正一同被扣押。
description.en: During the Xi'an Incident, Wei Lihuang was detained along with Chiang Kai-shek.

position.zh-cn: 少将副秘书长兼办公厅主任
position.en: Major General Deputy Secretary-General and Director of the General Office

description.zh-cn: 1948年4月回国后，汪德昭被卫立煌任命为东北剿总的少将副秘书长兼办公厅主任。
description.en: After returning to China in April 1948, Wang Dezhao was appointed by Wei Lihuang as Major General Deputy Secretary-General and Director of the General Office of the Northeast Bandit Suppression Headquarters.

description.zh-cn: 汪德昭是韩权华的外甥女婿。
description.en: Wang Dezhao was the husband of Han Quanhua's niece.

description.zh-cn: 为扭转东北战局，蒋中正派遣杜聿明为东北剿总副总司令，意图制衡并实际取代卫立煌的战场指挥权。
description.en: To reverse the tide in the Northeast, Chiang Kai-shek dispatched Du Yuming as Deputy Commander-in-Chief of the Northeast Bandit Suppression Headquarters, intending to counterbalance and effectively supersede Wei Lihuang's field command authority.

description.zh-cn: 抗日战争期间，卫立煌曾私自前往延安会见毛泽东。
description.en: During the Second Sino-Japanese War, Wei Lihuang privately traveled to Yan'an to meet with Mao Zedong.

description.zh-cn: 陈其五是中国共产党在国民党军队中的地下党员。
description.en: Chen Qiwu was an underground member of the Chinese Communist Party within the Kuomintang army.

description.zh-cn: 卫立煌出生于大清安徽省庐州府合肥县。
description.en: Wei Lihuang was born in Hefei County, Luzhou Prefecture, Anhui Province, during the Qing Dynasty.

relationships.target: 中国国民党革命委员会

description.zh-cn: 卫立煌回归大陆后，曾担任中国国民党革命委员会中央常务委员。
description.en: After returning to the mainland, Wei Lihuang served as a member of the Central Standing Committee of the Revolutionary Committee of the Chinese Kuomintang.

description.zh-cn: 抗日战争期间，卫立煌曾数次会晤朱德。
description.en: During the Second Sino-Japanese War, Wei Lihuang met with Zhu De several times.
